channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: How is students’ motivation related to their performance and anxiety?
item.description: How is students’ motivation related to their performance and anxiety? by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday 15 January 2019 at 6:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Denmark 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Denmark 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 15 January 2019 at 13:30 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 15 January 2019 at 13:30.

item.title: How do Europeans differ in their attitudes to immigration? - Findings from the European Social Survey 2002/03 – 2016/17
item.description: How do Europeans differ in their attitudes to immigration? - Findings from the European Social Survey 2002/03 – 2016/17 by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 16 January 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 16 January 2019 at 12:19.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: How do Europeans differ in their attitudes to immigration? - Findings from the European Social Survey 2002/03 – 2016/17
item.description: How do Europeans differ in their attitudes to immigration? - Findings from the European Social Survey 2002/03 – 2016/17 by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 16 January 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 16 January 2019 at 12:19.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Social Impact Investment 2019 - The Impact Imperative for Sustainable Development
item.description: Social Impact Investment 2019 - The Impact Imperative for Sustainable Development by Development Co-operation Directorate has an embargo on Thursday 17 January 2019 at 14:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 17 January 2019 at 14:00.

item.title: Trends Shaping Education 2019
item.description: Trends Shaping Education 2019 by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday 21 January 2019 at 10:00 and a launch event planned on Monday 21 January 2019 at 10:00.

item.title: OECD Skills Strategy Flanders - Assessment and Recommendations
item.description: OECD Skills Strategy Flanders - Assessment and Recommendations by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday 21 January 2019 at 14:30.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Hungary 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Hungary 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 31 January 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 31 January 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Rethinking Innovation for a Sustainable Ocean Economy
item.description: Rethinking Innovation for a Sustainable Ocean Economy by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Thursday 14 February 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 14 February 2019 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry
